Had first career hit (double) on 4/5/1971, off Tony Sampson (LYN)...
Earned first career win on 4/5/1971...

Injured on 4/24/1974 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...

Injured on 4/8/1979 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
